title: Is there a listing anywhere of the distances of the different walking paths within the city of Wilmington? And if so, where can the list be located?
text:
It took a little searching, but there's a listing here:
http://www.ci.wilmington.nc.us/Portals/0/documents/Community%20Services/Parks,%20Recreation,%20and%20Downtown%20Services/Parks%20and%20Landscapes/Parks_Guide_1%281%29.pdf
